summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5844 for the improvement of East Marginal Way, from Spokane Street to approximately 95 feet south of Diagonal Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77054, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
